hotels.name: Four Seasons Astir Palace

hotels.name: Hotel Amanzoe

restaurants.name: Oia Sunset Taverna
restaurants.desc: Sunset views, traditional food, Oia village
restaurants.longDesc: Traditional taverna in Oia with unforgettable caldera sunset views, homemade Greek dishes, and warm hospitality. Quintessential Santorini evening.

restaurants.name: Cavo Bianco
restaurants.desc: Mediterranean cuisine, Fira cliffside
restaurants.longDesc: Elegant Mediterranean restaurant on Fira's cliffside with creative cuisine, curated wines, and sunrise/sunset views. Epicurean island sanctuary.

restaurants.name: Petros Taverna Paros
restaurants.desc: Family taverna, Paros, authentic Greek
restaurants.longDesc: Family-run taverna on Paros serving authentic Greek cooking with daily specials, fresh fish, and island warmth. Generational Parian hospitality.

restaurants.name: Naxos Town Taverna
restaurants.desc: Traditional meze, Naxos, local favorite
restaurants.longDesc: Traditional meze restaurant in Naxos Town featuring local cheese, fresh vegetables, and simple island cooking. Where locals dine.

restaurants.name: Rethymno Waterfront
restaurants.desc: Cretan cuisine, Rethymnon harbor, sea views
restaurants.longDesc: Waterfront restaurant in Rethymnon serving authentic Cretan dishes with fresh fish daily and harbor views. Island cooking authenticity.

restaurants.name: Elounda Dining
restaurants.desc: Fine dining, Elounda, upscale Cretan
restaurants.longDesc: Upscale Cretan restaurant in Elounda with refined techniques applied to local ingredients and sea views. Cretan elegance.

restaurants.name: Forty One Beach Club
restaurants.desc: Black sand beach club, sunset cocktails, luxury cabanas, Greek island views
restaurants.longDesc: A premier beach club in Santorini offering stylish cabanas on black sand beaches with signature sunset cocktails and upscale seaside dining experiences.

restaurants.name: Monastiri Beach Bar
restaurants.desc: Beachfront bar, cocktails, Santorini coastline views, casual seaside dining
restaurants.longDesc: A relaxed beach bar on Santorini's coastline serving cocktails and casual fare with panoramic Aegean Sea views and a laid-back island atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Cabana Beach Bar
restaurants.desc: Beach cabanas, sunset cocktails, black sand beach, Greek island luxury
restaurants.longDesc: A sophisticated beach bar in Paros featuring upscale cabanas on scenic beaches with cocktails and Mediterranean seaside hospitality.

restaurants.name: Castello Hydra
restaurants.desc: Waterfront dining, stunning views, early dinner destination
restaurants.longDesc: A seaside restaurant offering dinner with panoramic views, providing an ideal setting for sunset dining on this car-free island.

restaurants.name: Kam.in Hydra
restaurants.desc: Casual brunch and coffee spot, local favorite, laid-back vibe
restaurants.longDesc: A relaxed cafe popular for morning coffee and brunch, offering a welcoming atmosphere for travelers and locals alike.

restaurants.name: Kodylenias
restaurants.desc: Waterfront dining, long leisurely lunches, scenic water views
restaurants.longDesc: A seaside restaurant specializing in extended, relaxed lunch service with beautiful water views and traditional Greek cuisine.

experiences.name: Acropolis & Parthenon
experiences.desc: Crown of Western civilization, book private family tour
experiences.longDesc: The crown jewel of Western civilization‚Äîthe temple of Athena Parthenos crowning Athens' sacred rock. Book a private family tour for context and fewer crowds.

experiences.name: Acropolis Museum
experiences.desc: World-class, Parthenon Gallery, glass floor over excavations
experiences.longDesc: World-class museum directly beneath the Parthenon with a glass floor revealing ongoing excavations and the stunning Parthenon Gallery. Family-friendly architecture.

experiences.name: Palace of Knossos
experiences.desc: Minoan palace, King Minos featuring stunning Greek beauty and authentic experiences
experiences.longDesc: Sprawling Minoan palace from 1700 BCE, the legendary home of King Minos and the mythological Labyrinth. Europe's oldest civilization makes Knossos an awe-inspiring journey.

experiences.name: Delos Island
experiences.desc: UNESCO, birthplace of Apollo, half-day from Mykonos
experiences.longDesc: UNESCO World Heritage birthplace of Apollo with haunting ruins and a half-day boat journey from Mykonos. Mystical archaeology.

experiences.name: Medieval Old Town Rhodes
experiences.desc: Largest inhabited medieval town in Europe, UNESCO
experiences.longDesc: Europe's largest inhabited medieval town with Knights Hospitaller architecture and winding cobbled streets frozen in time. A living, walkable history book.

experiences.name: Temple of Poseidon, Sounion
experiences.desc: Dramatic clifftop temple, spectacular sunset
experiences.longDesc: Dramatic clifftop temple perched 210 meters above the Aegean, built to honor the sea god and framing the most spectacular Greek sunset. Classical majesty.

experiences.name: Meteora Monasteries
experiences.desc: Surreal clifftop monasteries, UNESCO, 6 open to visitors
experiences.longDesc: Surreal UNESCO monasteries balanced atop impossibly high rock pillars, six remain active and open to visitors. Otherworldly spirituality.

experiences.name: Fira-Oia Hiking Trail
experiences.desc: 10km caldera-rim hike, breathtaking views, 3-4 hours
experiences.longDesc: 10-kilometer scenic caldera-rim hike connecting two Santorini villages with breathtaking cliff views of the volcanic crater. Three to four hours of pure Aegean beauty.

experiences.name: Sunset Catamaran Cruise
experiences.desc: Sail caldera, hot springs, snorkel, BBQ dinner onboard
experiences.longDesc: Sail into Santorini's caldera, swim in natural hot springs, explore volcanic beaches, and feast on a BBQ dinner as the sun melts into the sea. Ultimate Santorini experience.

experiences.name: Navagio Beach Viewpoint
experiences.desc: Most photographed beach in Greece, Zakynthos
experiences.longDesc: Most photographed beach in Greece features the iconic rusted shipwreck and turquoise cove on Zakynthos, accessible by boat or viewpoint hiking. Instagram-worthy authenticity.

experiences.name: Sarakiniko Beach
experiences.desc: Lunar white rock, turquoise pools, Milos
experiences.longDesc: Otherworldly lunar landscape of white weathered rock formations and crystalline turquoise pools on Milos island. Alien beauty.

experiences.name: Elafonissi Beach
experiences.desc: Pink sand, shallow lagoon, perfect for toddlers, Crete
experiences.longDesc: Unique pink-sand beach with protected shallow lagoon on Crete‚Äîsensory and safe for small children. Natural wonder.

experiences.name: Balos Lagoon
experiences.desc: Turquoise lagoon, shallow warm water, Crete
experiences.longDesc: Turquoise paradise lagoon in northwest Crete with shallow, impossibly clear waters ideal for young swimmers and snorkelers. Picture-perfect.

experiences.name: Santo Wines Winery
experiences.desc: Famous Assyrtiko wines, caldera sunset views
experiences.longDesc: Wine shop with tasting bar on Santorini featuring local Assyrtiko and volcanic wine selections overlooking the caldera. Shop with a view.

experiences.name: Venetsanos Winery
experiences.desc: Restored 1947 winery, cliffside tasting terrace
experiences.longDesc: Restored 1947 winery carved into a clifftside with a tasting terrace overlooking the caldera‚Äîwine, history, and vistas combined. Atmospheric excellence.

experiences.name: Akrotiri Archaeological Site
experiences.desc: Minoan city under volcanic ash, like Pompeii
experiences.longDesc: Preserved Minoan city frozen under volcanic ash like Pompeii, with intact streets, artifacts, and buildings from 1600 BCE. Time capsule excavation.

experiences.name: Spinalonga Island
experiences.desc: Venetian fortress, former leper colony, boat trip
experiences.longDesc: Venetian fortress turned haunting leper colony island, accessible by boat from Crete with layered history and island views. Poignant and powerful.

experiences.name: Hydra Island Day Trip
experiences.desc: Car-free island, donkey rides, 90 min from Piraeus
experiences.longDesc: Car-free island with donkey rides, harbor-side tavernas, and 90 minutes by ferry from Piraeus‚Äîbohemian Mediterranean escape. Slow-paced perfection.

experiences.name: Symi Island Day Trip
experiences.desc: Colorful harbor, sponge shops, from Rhodes
experiences.longDesc: Colorful harbor village with photogenic houses climbing the hillside and traditional sponge shops, easily visited from Rhodes. Postcard-pretty.

experiences.name: CookInAthens Class
experiences.desc: 5-course cooking, market visit, wine pairings
experiences.longDesc: Five-course hands-on cooking class including market tour, wine pairings, and take-home recipes with English-speaking instructors. Culinary education and adventure.

experiences.name: Athens Food Tour
experiences.desc: Central Market, tastings at 8-10 stops, guided
experiences.longDesc: Guided tour of the Central Market with tastings at 8-10 food stops, family-friendly and conducted by passionate food historians. Gastronomic discovery.

experiences.name: Turtle Spotting
experiences.desc: Loggerhead sea turtles, Laganas Bay, Zakynthos
experiences.longDesc: Loggerhead sea turtles nesting and hatchling season (June-September) in Laganas Bay, Zakynthos‚Äîevening boat tours for ethical wildlife encounters. Conservation and magic.

experiences.name: Olive Oil Farm Tour
experiences.desc: Press visits, tastings, near Athens
experiences.longDesc: Guided tour of Greek olive oil farms with press demonstrations, tasting sessions, and history of production. Liquid gold education.
experiences.photoAttribution: OLEOSOPHIA Olive Garden & Olive Oil Tastings

experiences.name: Samaria Gorge Trek
experiences.desc: Most famous gorge hike, Crete, 16km
experiences.longDesc: Greece's most famous gorge trek at 16 kilometers with dramatic cliff walls, mountain streams, and stunning coastal arrival. Alpine to sea adventure.

experiences.name: Delphi Archaeological Site
experiences.desc: Ancient sanctuary, Oracle, mountain setting
experiences.longDesc: Dramatically perched ancient sanctuary of Apollo with the famous Oracle's temple and stunning mountain views. Classical mystery and beauty.

experiences.name: National Archaeological Museum
experiences.desc: Greece's premier museum, vast antiquities
experiences.longDesc: Greece's premier museum housing vast collections of ancient sculpture, pottery, and artifacts spanning millennia. Comprehensive classical education.

experiences.name: Benaki Museum
experiences.desc: Greek culture through ages, art design
experiences.longDesc: Museum showcasing Greek culture from ancient to modern times with art, design, and historical perspectives. Cultural completeness.

experiences.name: Cyclades Art Studios
experiences.desc: Artist studios, Naxos, traditional crafts
experiences.longDesc: Working artist studios on Naxos featuring traditional crafts, sculpture, pottery, and painting with artist interactions. Creative inspiration.

experiences.name: Windmills of Mykonos
experiences.desc: Historic iconic windmills, photo spot
experiences.longDesc: Row of historic whitewashed windmills on Mykonos' hilltop, beautifully restored and iconic Mediterranean symbol. Postcard-perfect photography.

experiences.name: Rethymnon Old Town
experiences.desc: Venetian fortress, old harbor, traditional streets
experiences.longDesc: Charming Venetian old town with fortress, traditional architecture, waterfront tavernas, and narrow winding streets. Medieval island charm.

experiences.name: Paros Marble Quarries
experiences.desc: Historic marble, artisan workshops, tours
experiences.longDesc: Historic marble quarries that supplied ancient Greece with pure white Parian marble, now home to artisan stone workshops. Stone heritage.

experiences.name: Ionian Islands Ferry Tour
experiences.desc: Corfu, Zante, Kefalonia islands, multi-day
experiences.longDesc: Island-hopping ferry journey through the Ionian Sea visiting Corfu, Zante, and Kefalonia with green mountains and Venetian architecture. Western island adventure.
experiences.photoAttribution: Ionian Cruises | Corfu Daily Cruises to Paxos, Sivota, Parga & Albania

experiences.name: Sailing School Lessons
experiences.desc: Learn sailing, Athenian Riviera, professional
experiences.longDesc: Professional sailing lessons on the Athenian Riviera with experienced instructors, small classes, and beautiful coastal views. Maritime skill-building.

experiences.name: Scuba Diving Santorini
experiences.desc: Dive sites, underwater archaeology, PADI
experiences.longDesc: PADI-certified scuba diving in Santorini with underwater archaeological sites, volcanic formations, and Mediterranean marine life. Underwater discovery.

experiences.name: Paragliding Mykonos
experiences.desc: Coastal tandem flights, Aegean views
experiences.longDesc: Tandem paragliding flights launching from Mykonos' hills with breathtaking Aegean views, professional pilots, and unforgettable perspectives. Flight freedom.
experiences.address: Elia beach Mykonos island, Mikonos 846 00, Greece

experiences.name: Island Foraging Tour
experiences.desc: Learn wild herbs, Naxos, culinary use
experiences.longDesc: Guided foraging tour on Naxos learning to identify wild herbs and plants used in traditional Greek cuisine and medicine. Botanical culinary adventure.

experiences.name: Byzantine Museum Athens
experiences.desc: Byzantine art, mosaics, religious artifacts
experiences.longDesc: Museum dedicated to Byzantine art with mosaics, icons, and religious artifacts spanning the empire's history. Spiritual historical collection.

experiences.name: War Museum Athens
experiences.desc: Military history, Greece independence
experiences.longDesc: Museum tracing Greek military history from ancient times through modern conflicts with weapons, uniforms, and historical documents. Historical perspective.

experiences.name: Serifos
experiences.desc: Quiet Cycladic island with pristine beaches, shoulder season charm, warm Mediterranean waters
experiences.longDesc: A serene Greek island known for its beautiful beaches and peaceful atmosphere. Perfect for visiting in shoulder season when restaurants aren't overwhelmed and temperatures hover around 26-27¬∞C.

experiences.name: Sifnos
experiences.desc: Food-focused Greek island known for culinary excellence and traditional gastronomy
experiences.longDesc: A celebrated Greek island renowned for its exceptional food culture and culinary traditions. An ideal destination for travelers seeking to explore authentic Greek cuisine and local food experiences.

experiences.name: The Rooster Antiparos
experiences.desc: Unorganized beach with instant setup, picnic baskets, pristine Cycladic setting
experiences.longDesc: One of Antiparos's most beautiful unorganized beaches, maintained in its natural purity. Offers instant beach setup and picnic baskets under the Greek sun with views of the Cycladic sea.

experiences.name: Hydra Town
experiences.desc: Charming stone alleyways, car-free village, donkeys and boats
experiences.longDesc: A picturesque pedestrian-only town featuring winding stone streets, traditional architecture, and a relaxed Mediterranean atmosphere accessible only by boat.

experiences.name: Spilia
experiences.desc: Scenic rock swimming spot, crystal-clear waters, natural beach
experiences.longDesc: A natural swimming area where visitors can dive off rocks into pristine Aegean waters, offering an authentic Greek island experience.

experiences.name: Hydronetta
experiences.desc: Waterfront swimming spot, seaside access, natural beach setting
experiences.longDesc: A scenic waterfront location perfect for swimming and enjoying the Aegean, combining natural beauty with accessible entry points.

experiences.name: Paralia Kaminia
experiences.desc: Scenic beach with waterfront dining, sunset views, early dinner spot
experiences.longDesc: A charming beach destination offering swimming and dining experiences with stunning views, ideal for early evening meals overlooking the water.

experiences.name: Halkidiki Island
experiences.desc: Hidden gem island destination, tranquil escape, northern Greece
experiences.longDesc: A perfect destination for low-key travelers seeking hidden gems and tranquil escapes in northern Greece, offering serene natural beauty and peaceful exploration.

experiences.name: Paxos
experiences.desc: Serene Ionian island, slow-paced living, pristine beaches, Mediterranean charm
experiences.longDesc: A picturesque island destination perfect for travelers seeking a leisurely summer escape with authentic Greek island culture, crystal-clear waters, and a relaxed pace of life.

experiences.name: Mononaftis Bay
experiences.desc: Scenic coastal bay, crystal waters, dramatic cliffs, ideal for swimming and water activities
experiences.longDesc: A beautiful and relatively secluded bay along Crete's northern shoreline, known for its clear turquoise waters and dramatic cliff formations, offering a pristine natural setting for coastal exploration.

experiences.name: Limeni
experiences.desc: Jewel-like coastal waters, scenic bay village, swimming and water activities
experiences.longDesc: A picturesque coastal destination in Mani known for its jewel-like turquoise waters, just a 5-minute drive from Ari√° Estate Suites & Spa, offering swimming and exploration opportunities.

experiences.name: Mani Region
experiences.desc: Historic mountainous peninsula, traditional villages, cultural exploration, outdoor activities
experiences.longDesc: A compelling travel destination in the southern Peloponnese featuring traditional architecture, historical sites, and scenic landscapes ideal for exploration from a resort base.

experiences.name: Folegandros
experiences.desc: Secluded Cycladic island, unspoiled landscape, tranquil retreat, cliffside villages
experiences.longDesc: An off-the-beaten-path Greek island offering a peaceful escape from tourist crowds, featuring dramatic cliffs, traditional architecture, and authentic island atmosphere.

kidFriendly.name: Cretaquarium
kidFriendly.longDesc: Over 2,000 marine creatures from the Mediterranean and beyond in touch-pools and interactive exhibits, perfectly scaled for young explorers in Heraklion. Wet and spectacular.

kidFriendly.name: Attica Zoological Park
kidFriendly.desc: 290+ species, petting zoo, dolphin shows, Athens
kidFriendly.longDesc: 290+ animal species including petting zoo, dolphin shows, and exotic creatures on a sprawling grounds in Athens. All-day family entertainment.

kidFriendly.name: Allou! Fun Park
kidFriendly.desc: Theme park + Kidom for young kids, Athens
kidFriendly.longDesc: Amusement park with rides for all ages plus Kidom interactive play area specifically designed for young children in central Athens. Classic fun.
kidFriendly.address: ŒõŒµœâœÜ. ŒöŒ∑œÜŒπœÉŒøœç, Petrou Ralli Œ∫Œ±Œπ, Ag. Ioannis Rentis 182 33, Greece

kidFriendly.name: Faliraki Water Park
kidFriendly.desc: Europe's largest water park, Rhodes, slides
kidFriendly.longDesc: Europe's largest water park on Rhodes with slides, lazy river, and family-friendly pools for every swimming ability. Splashy paradise.

kidFriendly.name: Water City
kidFriendly.longDesc: Crete water park with multiple slides, splash zones, and dedicated toddler areas for safe summer cooling-off. Smaller and more manageable than megaparks.

kidFriendly.name: Hellenic Children
kidFriendly.longDesc: Interactive museum for ages 2-12 in Plaka, Athens with hands-on exhibits exploring nature, science, and culture. Learning disguised as play.

kidFriendly.name: National Garden
kidFriendly.desc: Duck ponds, mini zoo, playground, shaded, Athens
kidFriendly.longDesc: Botanical oasis in downtown Athens with duck ponds, mini zoo, playground, and shaded walkways‚Äîperfect for young kids needing green space. Urban escape.

kidFriendly.name: Flisvos Marina Playground
kidFriendly.longDesc: Modern waterfront playground with trampolines, slides, and seaside location in Athens‚Äîa contemporary facilities favorite. Aegean backyard.

kidFriendly.name: Agios Georgios Beach
kidFriendly.desc: Best toddler beach, calm shallow water, Naxos
kidFriendly.longDesc: Best toddler beach on Naxos with calm, shallow water and soft sand‚Äîa rarity in Greece. Safety and sunshine.

kidFriendly.name: Golden Beach
kidFriendly.desc: Long sandy, shallow, windsurfing for adults, Paros
kidFriendly.longDesc: Long sandy shallow beach on Paros suitable for young swimmers with windsurfing for adults on the side. Community-oriented.

kidFriendly.name: Elafonissi Beach
kidFriendly.desc: Pink sand, shallow lagoon, nature reserve, Crete
kidFriendly.longDesc: Unique pink-sand beach with protected shallow lagoon on Crete‚Äîsensory and safe for small children. Natural wonder.

kidFriendly.name: St. Paul Beach
kidFriendly.desc: Sheltered cove, clear water, Lindos, Rhodes
kidFriendly.longDesc: Sheltered cove beach near Lindos, Rhodes with calm clear waters protected from waves‚Äîa peaceful family swimming spot. Hidden gem.

kidFriendly.name: Perissa Beach
kidFriendly.longDesc: Black volcanic sand beach on Santorini with organized facilities, calm sections, and unique lunar landscape. Safe and otherworldly.

kidFriendly.name: Caretta Turtle Beach
kidFriendly.longDesc: Protected turtle nesting beach on Zakynthos with dedicated facilities, educational programs, and evening hatchling releases June-September. Conservation magic.

kidFriendly.name: Aqua Plus Water Park
kidFriendly.longDesc: Family-friendly water park in Crete with age-appropriate slides, splash pools, and dedicated toddler areas. Safe water fun.

kidFriendly.name: Byzantine & Christian Museum
kidFriendly.longDesc: Museum with hands-on activities and interactive exhibits designed for children exploring ancient and Byzantine artifacts. Educational engagement.

kidFriendly.name: Crete Aquarium Show
kidFriendly.desc: Interactive marine shows, feeding times, kids
kidFriendly.longDesc: Interactive marine animal shows with scheduled feeding times and educational presentations perfect for children. Aquatic learning.

kidFriendly.name: Mykonos Windmill Slide
kidFriendly.longDesc: Historic windmill area with adjacent playground equipment, great for kids after sightseeing and amazing for family photos. Photo fun.

kidFriendly.name: Pefkos Beach Mykonos
kidFriendly.desc: Family beach, calm water, tavernas, Mykonos
kidFriendly.longDesc: Family-friendly beach on Mykonos with calm water, beachfront tavernas, and shade facilities‚Äîideal for relaxed family beach days. Beach comfort.

markets.name: Varvakios Central Market
markets.desc: Europe's most vibrant food market, Athens
markets.longDesc: Europe's most vibrant food market in downtown Athens with butchers, fishmongers, produce vendors, and aromatic spice stalls. Sensory overload in the best way.

markets.name: Monastiraki Flea Market
markets.longDesc: Antiques, vintage clothing, handcrafts, and souvenirs fill winding alleys with Sunday expansion for maximum browsing. Treasures hiding in chaos.

markets.name: Chania Central Market
markets.longDesc: Beautiful cross-shaped 1913 stone hall filled with Cretan products‚Äîcheeses, olive oil, herbs, and local crafts. Architectural charm meets gastronomy.

markets.name: Naxos Old Market
markets.desc: Graviera cheese, kitron liqueur, honey, spoon sweets
markets.longDesc: Charming village market specializing in local Graviera cheese, kitron liqueur, island honey, and traditional spoon sweets. Sweet discovery.

markets.name: Heraklion Market Street
markets.longDesc: 1866 Street in Crete packed with herb vendors, cheese shops, leather goods, and local crafts from Cretan producers. Authentic commerce.

markets.name: Syntagma Produce Market
markets.longDesc: Daily produce market near Syntagma Square with fresh Greek fruits, vegetables, and seasonal specialties from local farmers. Farm-fresh shopping.

markets.name: Rethymnon Food Market
markets.desc: Cretan cheese, herbs, honey, local products
markets.longDesc: Traditional market in Rethymnon's old town featuring Cretan cheeses, dried herbs, island honey, and local specialties. Cretan authenticity.

markets.name: Mykonos Fish Market
markets.desc: Daily fresh fish catch, seafood specialists
markets.longDesc: Daily fish market in Mykonos with fresh catches from the night's fishing boats and specialist seafood vendors. Marine bounty.

markets.name: Santorini Wine Market
markets.longDesc: Market dedicated to Santorini's volcanic wines with tastings from local producers and educational displays about the unique terroir. Wine culture hub.

markets.name: Paros Artisan Market
markets.longDesc: Market featuring local Parian artisans, handmade crafts, marble sculptures, and unique island products. Creative commerce.

markets.name: Rhodes Old Town Market
markets.longDesc: Winding market lanes in Rhodes' medieval old town with traditional crafts, spices, textiles, and authentic local souvenirs. Historic shopping.

markets.name: Crete Honey & Herbs Market
markets.longDesc: Specialty market in Crete dedicated to island honey, dried herbs, natural oils, and traditional Cretan remedies. Pure natural products.

markets.name: Athens Olive Oil Market
markets.longDesc: Specialty market showcasing Greek olive oils from different regions with tastings and expert guidance on quality and flavor profiles. Liquid gold selection.
markets.address: Maison d' Olive, Xanthippou 7-9, Athina 106 75, Greece

markets.name: Psyrri Antique Market
markets.longDesc: Trendy neighborhood antique market with vintage finds, local artisan products, and eclectic treasures in the hip Psyrri district. Curated collectibles.

markets.name: Corfu Old Town Market
markets.longDesc: Market in Corfu's charming old town featuring Ionian local products, Corfiot cheese, local citrus, and island specialties. Western island flavors.

markets.name: Drougas Bakery
markets.desc: Local pastries, Greek coffee, best frappe on the island
markets.longDesc: A beloved local bakery known for authentic Greek pastries and serving the island's finest frappe, a daily destination for residents and visitors.

a.name: Greatest Hits (7 Days)
a.description: Athens, Santorini, and Mykonos ‚Äî the ultimate first-timer Greek experience with ancient ruins, iconic sunsets, and Cycladic charm.

c.description: Epic journey from Athens through the Cyclades to Crete and Rhodes, capturing Greece's greatest archaeological, culinary, and coastal treasures.

d.description: Indulgent couples escape through Athens, Santorini, and Mykonos with spa treatments, infinity pools, and sunset champagne.

e.name: Culinary Odyssey (10 Days)
e.description: Food-lover's journey from Athens markets through Cretan vineyards to island tavernas, tracing Greece's culinary soul.
